meta.description: Don't forget our free email newsletter! http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Dr. Kevin Conners explains why he says the flu shot is much worse than other vaccines. Find out the long odds of getting the vaccine 'right' each year and how it becomes more dangerous for people who are already vulnerable!

title: Why This Dr. Says The Flu Shot is Worse Than Other Vaccines!
cleaned_text: Dr. Kevin Conners explains why he says the flu shot is much worse than other vaccines. Find out the long odds of getting the vaccine 'right' each year and how it becomes more dangerous for people who are already vulnerable!
